description.english: You can call yourself a non-beginner now!
description.koreana: 이정도면 뉴비탈출은 했다고 볼 수 있죠!

description.english: One small mistake can get you killed—stay sharp!
You're officially an intermediate Shape Leveler!

displayName.english: [Normal Difficulty] Clear Genocide Crystal under Level 75000

description.english: Extreme bosses are on a whole different level...

displayName.english: [Normal Difficulty] Clear Djoy Dairon under Level 195000

description.english: A whole forest of levels… wow.
A nation made of levels… insane.
Yes. Now the real game begins.
About the same as a grenade.
You just detonated a massive bomb!
You could go toe-to-toe with a nuke!
You might beat a nation in one hit...
Movement consumes hunger and hydration—be careful!
One playthrough won’t be enough, huh?
What would the beach look like then?
Boss patterns can get pretty wild.

description.koreana: 너가 선택한 보스다 악으로 깡으로 버텨라!

description.english: 3 is too few, 333 is too many.
In real life, death is permanent.
The hospital isn’t a respawn point...
You could fill a graveyard with yourself.
Just become a grim reaper already.
Life would be so easy with this much money...
description.koreana: 이정도 돈만 있으면 얼마나 살기 좋을까...

description.english: A nation’s economy in real life.
Super minerals like Vitalite can be worth that much.
description.koreana: 비탈라이트같은 슈퍼광물은 실제로 그정도 가치가 가능합니다.

description.english: This is an insult to the game!
Would you ever punch this much in real life?
description.koreana: 평생 이만큼 때릴 일도 없지 않나..?

description.english: Ever been kicked at the speed of light?

displayName.english: Complete Codex up to Dimension Realm

description.english: You’ll need to hunt monsters for promotions anyway~

displayName.english: Complete Codex up to Circle Village
Complete Codex up to Macro City

description.english: Looks like it hurts... (That’s a hint.)
Shape Level Up has a predecessor.
They say there’s treasure on the Half-Moon Island.
A shop in the middle of the desert.
Hey! You’re not supposed to do that.
Not as easy as it sounds.
Move as freely as an angel.
If you cleared this, you're already a veteran.
Its value shines like the sun...
Line them up and knock them down.
Why does it feel the same as 3518?
With 3500s tech, aging might be optional.
Did you just travel the world?
Walking from Earth to the Moon!
You could stop a meteor with that.
